summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of Caroline Avenue from North 88th Street to approximately 300 feet south thereof, and certain other streets, avenues and easements, by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6129, authorizing an increase in the amount to be paid from the Sewer Fund in aid thereof, and amending Section 2 of Ordinance No. 85184.
